name: wsirc darker
description: Dark theme for wsirc.com. As of june 2015, wsirc is beta in transition, so don't know how long this will work. At the time of writing this, the theme isn't too beautiful but sets a darker colorscheme for wsirc, so readability is improved at night.

user.name: sincewheniamcreative
user.about: When something new is online, I was bored ;).
